20101206222233.000|20101206222235.000|CCO|YOU LOOKED OVER IT, I SAY YES 
20101206222235.000|20101206222237.000|CCO|AND I SIGN IT.
20101206222237.000|20101206222239.000|CCO|THE REASON I TAKE THE
